meta.title: Digg - What the Internet is talking about right now

div.a: The Largest 3D Map Of The Universe Ever Created

div.div: This week, the Sloan Digital Sky Survey released its latest round of cosmic cartography, officially titled "Data Release 9" but more accurately referred to as "whoa, the largest ever 3D map of the universe."

div.a: Gorgeous video. The largest ever 3D map of the universe

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Tk53qF&via=Digg&text=The Largest 3D Map Of The Universe Ever Created

div.a: NBC Approved This Creepy, Porny Video Of Female Olympians

div.div: Apparently NBC is too busy focusing on jiggling ladies' asses to notice ladies kicking ass.

div.a: The bow-chicka-wow-wow music really makes it. RT @Jezebel NBC Approved This Creepy, Porny Video of Female Olympians

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OOccMK&via=Digg&text=NBC Approved This Creepy, Porny Video Of Female Olympians

div.div: SPOILER ALERT: HE FINALLY EATS THE CAT
Hide your cats, people, it looks like ALF may be making a comeback.

div.a: The Torture Of Attending The 'American Idol For Startups'

div.div: "It’s like watching some sadist work over a baby lamb with a rusty crowbar and a broken gin bottle. The names of these startups sound like the products of an aggressive brain tumor on the frontal lobe."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RDGkPQ&via=Digg&text=The Torture Of Attending The 'American Idol For Startups'

div.div: Florida prosecutors accidentally distributed a post-mortem photo of Trayvon Martin as well as copies of George Zimmerman's college records, material that Florida law considers confidential and exempt from disclosure.
THIS STORY WILL SELF-DESTRUCT IN 5 SECONDS

div.a: App Lets You 'Burn' Disposable Phone Numbers To Hide Your Identity

div.div: "Burning" a communication device has been a mainstay of those interested in privacy, from the IMF (you know, from 'Mission: Impossible'), the corner boys on 'The Wire,' and everyone in between.

div.a: Forget *67. With @Burnerapp you can live out your spy fantasies for a small charge. (via @cfarivar)

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OMJegm&via=Digg&text=App Lets You 'Burn' Disposable Phone Numbers To Hide Your Identity

div.div: BETTER THAN TAKING OUT STUDENT LOANS

div.a: Peter Thiel's College Dropouts: How's That Working Out?

div.div: Peter Thiel, co-founder of PayPal and prolific angel investor, sparked controversy last fall when he announced a fellowship giving 24 young adults $100,000 over two years to leave college and pursue entrepreneurship full time. Halfway through the program, Inc. checked in with some of the young entrepreneurs.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/MPjmzY&via=Digg&text=Peter Thiel's College Dropouts: How's That Working Out?

div.a: Amazon Forces Startup To Suspend Crowdfunding For Creative Commons eBooks

div.div: Amazon has informed Unglue.it that it will no longer process crowdfunded payments put toward converting books licensed under creative commons into ebooks.

div.a: RT @lorcanD: Amazon forces Unglue.it to Suspend Crowdfunding for Creative Commons eBooks

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/N98Lo6&via=Digg&text=Amazon Forces Startup To Suspend Crowdfunding For Creative Commons eBooks

div.a: Here Is The Star Trek Remix Of 'Call Me Maybe' And It's Awesome

div.div: We thank whoever took the time to make this awesome video.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OWAgxq&via=Digg&text=Here Is The Star Trek Remix Of 'Call Me Maybe' And It's Awesome

div.a: Stomach Sleepers More Likely To Have Erotic Dreams

div.div: Prone sleepers reported feeling sensations related to ‘sex’ and ‘persecution’ more frequently than anyone else. Among the other racy motifs that came up for them were ‘being tied up’, ‘being locked up’ and ‘unable to move’.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TkndbW&via=Digg&text=Stomach Sleepers More Likely To Have Erotic Dreams

div.div: Reddit user Znaught charts the magical connection between clicking “like” and making things happen IRL.
THEY JUST DON'T MAKE 'EM LIKE THEY USED TO
The Olympic Games seem to celebrate the extremes of athletic physique — from tiny gymnasts to impossibly huge shot-putters. But why are they shaped that way?

div.a: A 3 Billion Pixel Panorama Of An Olympic Volleyball Game

div.div: A photographer took hundreds of high-resolution photos of the 2012 Olympic women's beach volleyball game and stitched them together into a single 3 billion pixel image.

div.a: You can zoom so far in on my Olympics women's beach volleyball Gigapan that you can see @JenniferKessy's toenail color.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/NTkKWB&via=Digg&text=A 3 Billion Pixel Panorama Of An Olympic Volleyball Game

div.a: Cannibal Victim Speaks For The First Time

div.a: How NASA Invented Curiosity's Terrifying Landing System

div.div: A fascinating insider's view of one of the most amazing space exploration feats in the history of humankind.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Nlm7Kc&via=Digg&text=How NASA Invented Curiosity's Terrifying Landing System

div.a: Why Doesn't Sand Stick To Beach Volleyball Players?

div.div: How do beach volleyball players manage to avoid the billions of granules of sand that cover their sport's playing surface?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/P5Sgce&via=Digg&text=Why Doesn't Sand Stick To Beach Volleyball Players?

div.a: Humans on Mars: The Craziest, Weirdest, and Most Plausible Plans in History

div.div: Between 1950 and 2000, NASA and various independent groups have come up with more than 1,000 detailed studies for manned Mars missions. Yet not a single one has come very close to fruition.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Nm0kCk&via=Digg&text=Humans on Mars: The Craziest, Weirdest, and Most Plausible Plans in History

div.a: Hosting The Olympics Is 6x More Expensive Than Flying A Robot To Mars

div.div: It's not often that a NASA project appears to be a bargain, but in this case, it certainly does.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ONIbg7&via=Digg&text=Hosting The Olympics Is 6x More Expensive Than Flying A Robot To Mars
